[GAME SUMMARY]

                                                                       
The Political Machine 2008, a new PC game that puts players in control of the
2008 presidential campaign. Play as the campaign manager for a host of
candidates including Barack Obama, John McCain, Hillary Clinton, historical
candidates or design one from scratch. Players then choose their campaign
battlegrounds and are off on the campaign trail to face a host of challenges
including fundraising, talk show appearances, hiring spin doctors and winning
endorsements. The game is won on Election Day by the player who gets the
necessary electoral votes to become President.
